snippet.textDisplay: This is one of the games I played the most in my entire life. And it happens that Koopa Beach 1 is the track I played the most (in time trial). I'm not a fan of that kind of song in general, but I heard it so much that I couldn't help but develop a special liking to this particular song. It's just awesome, and filled with memories.
snippet.textOriginal: This is one of the games I played the most in my entire life. And it happens that Koopa Beach 1 is the track I played the most (in time trial). I'm not a fan of that kind of song in general, but I heard it so much that I couldn't help but develop a special liking to this particular song. It's just awesome, and filled with memories.

snippet.textDisplay: @saurfan Red shells cannot be thrown backwards in this game. Green shells cannot either (they are simply deposited on the ground when used while holding "down").

snippet.textDisplay: Memories of being 12! Great game with great tunes.
snippet.textOriginal: Memories of being 12! Great game with great tunes.

snippet.textDisplay: Koopa was my character of choice in this game. I played this game a lot with my brother, pretty much until we got Mario Kart 64. I remember as kid I had a dream where I had my own kart and I'd drive around the world. Then I saw a rainbow and I tried driving on it (like the Rainbow Road) but it completely failed and I ended up crashing on a tree. That dream was... weird.
snippet.textOriginal: Koopa was my character of choice in this game. I played this game a lot with my brother, pretty much until we got Mario Kart 64. I remember as kid I had a dream where I had my own kart and I'd drive around the world. Then I saw a rainbow and I tried driving on it (like the Rainbow Road) but it completely failed and I ended up crashing on a tree. That dream was... weird.
